content: NPR 24 kN RLS® Pipe press jaw Press jaws for RLS® press fittings up to 1-3/8. Compatible with Hilti NPR 24-22 pipe press tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Inserts for pressing, crimping & cutting- - ### FEATURES:Features Press jaws designed for RLS® press fittings made by Rapid Locking System® up to 1-3/8 Designed for the use with the Hilti NPR 24-22 pipe press tool, helping to ensure system compatibility Simpler maintenance management – equipped with NFC tag for easy identification and asset management via Hilti Connect and ON!Track Applications Pressing RLS® press fittings for HVAC and refrigeration pipe installations up to 1-3/8 *These values are system dependent. In order to ensure correct and safe pressing, consult the original instruction manual from the system supplier ### TECHNICAL DATA: Press profile: RLS Service interval: 15.000 cycles or 1 year Technical Data | Press profile | RLS | Service interval | 15.000 cycles or 1 year ### ITEMS- 2341681 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 1 1/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 1 1/8 Press jaws - 2341683 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 1 3/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 1 3/8 Press jaws - 2341676 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 1/2 Press jaws - 2341673 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 1/4 Press jaws - 2341678 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 3/4 Press jaws - 2341675 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 3/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 3/8 Press jaws - 2341674 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 5/16 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 5/16 Press jaws - 2341677 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 5/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 5/8 Press jaws - 2341679 - Press jaws NPR PC RLS 7/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC RLS 7/8 Press jaws
